title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. V, pt. 2370 - Public Access To The Records Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance And The State Tax Commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. V, pt. 2370 - Public Access To The Records Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance And The State Tax Commission

State Regulations
§ 2370.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 2370.2 - Designation and duties of the records access officer
§ 2370.3 - Fiscal officer
§ 2370.4 - Index of records
§ 2370.5 - Requests for public access to records
§ 2370.6 - Inspecting and copying of records
§ 2370.7 - Protection of trade secrets
§ 2370.8 - Procedure to be followed in the event of denial of access to records or denial of exception from disclosure
§ 2370.9 - Fees
§ 2370.10 - Public notice

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. V, pt. 2370

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6; Tax Law, §171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
